exec-add-migration.commandLineArgs: exec --project ../../../../../tests/TestingAppHost1/TestingAppHost1.AppHost/TestingAppHost1.AppHost.csproj --resource mywebapp1 -- dotnet ef migrations add Init --msbuildprojectextensionspath D:\code\aspire\artifacts\obj\TestingAppHost1.MyWebApp

exec-add-migration-withdb.commandLineArgs: exec --project ../../../../../tests/TestingAppHost1/TestingAppHost1.AppHost/TestingAppHost1.AppHost.csproj --resource mywebapp1 --add-postgres -- dotnet ef migrations add Init --msbuildprojectextensionspath D:\code\aspire\artifacts\obj\TestingAppHost1.MyWebApp

exec-database-update.commandLineArgs: exec --project ../../../../../tests/TestingAppHost1/TestingAppHost1.AppHost/TestingAppHost1.AppHost.csproj --resource mywebapp1 -- dotnet ef database update
